short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatFlow for ChatGPT provides a convenient way to manage prompts, making your interactions more efficient and enjoyable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your ChatGPT experience with the OpenAI Chat Prompt Populator 🚀, a free and open-source 💻 Chrome extension. This innovative tool elevates your interactions with ChatGPT, making it quicker and more efficient to use. Ideal for frequent ChatGPT users seeking a seamless integration 🌐.

Key Features:
✍️ Prompt Auto-Population:  Fills the prompt textarea with your predefined or custom prompts, saving precious time.
🛠️ Manage Your Prompts: Add, edit, or remove prompts easily, allowing for a customized prompt library that caters to your specific needs.
📋 Model Selection: Opens the model selection menu and picks a specified model automatically.
🔗 Integration with FlowLauncher:  Use ChatGPT from any file on your computer, thanks to FlowLauncher compatibility.

Contribute & Enhance:
This user-friendly plugin invites contributions. Fork, add your unique features, or suggest improvements 🌟.

License:
Distributed under the MIT License 📜, ensuring freedom and openness.
